newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Sept 27.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Sept 27.

text.p: The New York Times reported the following stories on its front page on Friday:
* A second day of gunfire between Arabs and Israelis swept across the West Bank and into the Gaza Strip on Thursday, killing 39 Palestinians and 11 Israelis.
* A split is forming among Israelis over confidence in the peace initiatives with Palestinian forces.
* Frustration and dashed hopes for lasting peace fed the anger of Palestinians that contributed to this week's outbreak of violence.
* Shuttle astronaut Shannon Lucid returned to Earth after six months in space.
* The Senate sustained President Clinton's veto of a bill that would have banned a form of late-term abortions.
* House of Representatives Newt Gingrich was targeted in four new charges by the House Ethics Committee.
* Household income rose in 1995 for the first time in six years, the Census Bureau reported on Thursday.
